channel.title: Having trouble adding Galkons dual gs's, help please?
channel.description:
Ok, I added the ints, and I'm pretty sure I did that correctly. I also added the drop/invy model and the wielded model into my models folder in my client. But when I spawn it, it just shows up as a null. Like, it says their name, and the examine info is correct, but I cant wield them, and its a picture of the rag and bones man bag lol.
Now, i know you have to type in some add model thing, but I'm not sure how to do that. Either way, when I put the models into my model folder, I just put them in as 99999.dat and 99998.dat. Do I need to name them something special? Ugh, idk. Help please. =]

item.title: Having trouble adding Galkons dual gs's, help please?
item.dc:creator: @codyganzell codyganzell
item.description:
@codyganzell wrote:

Ok, I added the ints, and I’m pretty sure I did that correctly. I also added the drop/invy model and the wielded model into my models folder in my client. But when I spawn it, it just shows up as a null. Like, it says their name, and the examine info is correct, but I cant wield them, and its a picture of the rag and bones man bag lol.

Now, i know you have to type in some add model thing, but I’m not sure how to do that. Either way, when I put the models into my model folder, I just put them in as 99999.dat and 99998.dat. Do I need to name them something special? Ugh, idk. Help please. =]
